data.title: Distance from East London to Mthatha
data.meta_description: Distance between East London and Mthatha is 179 kilometers (111 miles) in South Africa. Also calculate the driving distance and how far is it the travel time.
data.text:
How far is it between East London and Mthatha

East London is located in South Africa with (-33.0153,27.9116) coordinates and Mthatha is located in South Africa with (-31.5889,28.7844) coordinates. The calculated flying distance from East London to Mthatha is equal to 111 miles which is equal to 179 km.

If you want to go by car, the driving distance between East London and Mthatha is 224.96 km. If you ride your car with an average speed of 112 kilometers/hour (70 miles/h), travel time will be 02 hours 00 minutes. Please check the avg. speed travel time table on the right for various options.

Difference between fly and go by a car is 46 km.
